ProductInfo.Features:
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby. Support 2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz. Android 4.2 operating system, better reliability and compatibility.
MTK6572W Cortex A7 Dual Core 1.3GHz CPU, excellent processing platform. 4.0-inch WVGA 480 * 800 pixels 5 point touch capacitive touchscreen. 0.3Megapixe(interpolation 2.0MP) front camera and
2.0megapixel(interpolation 5.0MP) rear camera with flashlight. 512MB RAM+4GB ROM and support micro SD card / TF card expansion up to 32GB. High capacity 1350mAh polymer lithium ion battery, long standby time. Support Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, G-sensor, etc.
Language	Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Afrikaans, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Melayu, Catala, Cestina, Dansk, Deutsch, English, Spanish, Filipino, French, Hrvatski, Lsizulu, Italian, Kiswahili, Latviesu, Lietuviy, Magyar, Nederlands, Norsk, Polski, Portuguese, Romana, Rumantsch, Slovencina, Slovenscina, Suomi, Svenska, Vietnamese, Turkish, Greek, Bulgarian, Russian, Serbian, Ukrainian, Hebrew, Bengali, Arabic, Persian, Hindi, India Urdu, Thai, Korean
